sourcesContent:
Profile Form

Address

Password

Emergency contact

Roles


import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { ProfileFormService } from '../services/profile-form.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profileForm', templateUrl: './profileForm.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profileForm.component.css'] }) export class ProfileFormComponent implements OnInit { rolesList: string[] = []; constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder, public profileFormService: ProfileFormService) { } ngOnInit() { this.profileFormService.getAllRoles() .subscribe({ next: res => { this.rolesList = res; } }) } onSubmit(form: NgForm) { this.profileFormService.postFormData() .subscribe({ next: res => { console.log(res); }, error: err =>{ console.log(err); } }) } }
